SELECT a.id AS "id", a.`name` AS "title", a.type AS "type", a.dataType as "dataType", a.userID, a.createTime AS "createTime", a.startTime as "startTime", a.endTime as "endTime", a.timeInterval AS "timeInterval", a.materialClassID as "materialClassID", a.contrastRegionID as "contrastRegionID", group_concat(DISTINCT b. NAME) AS "materialName", group_concat(DISTINCT c. NAME) AS "areaName" FROM page_report a LEFT JOIN hlidx_category b ON find_in_set(b.id,a.materialClassID) LEFT JOIN hlidx_areas c ON find_in_set(c.id,a.contrastRegionID)
a.statusID = "qy"
AND a.type = #{type}
AND a.dataType = #{dataType}
AND (a.type = '1' or (a.type = '2' and a.userID = #{userID}))
AND a.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
AND a.userID = #{userID}
group by id
ORDER BY a.createTime DESC
ORDER BY a.createTime DESC
ORDER BY a.createTime
ORDER BY a.dataType DESC
ORDER BY a.dataType
LIMIT #{pageCurrent},#{pSize}

SELECT m.id, m.`type`, m. NAME, m.logo, m.content, ifnull(i.mark, m.mark) AS mark, m.userID, m.statusID, m.createTime, m.updateTime, m.timeInterval, m.materialClassID, m.contrastRegionID FROM ( SELECT * FROM page_report WHERE id = #{reportId} ) m LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM page_repor_remark WHERE userId = #{userId} ) i ON m.id = i.reportId

SELECT a.id AS "id", a.`name` AS "title", a.dataType AS "dataType", a.type AS "type", a.contrastRegionID as "contrastRegionID", a.materialClassID as "materialClassID", group_concat(DISTINCT b. NAME) AS "materialName", group_concat(DISTINCT c. NAME) AS "areaName", a.createTime as "createTime", a.timeInterval AS "timeInterval", a.startTime AS "startTime", a.endTime AS "endTime" FROM page_report a LEFT JOIN hlidx_category b ON find_in_set(b.id,a.materialClassID) LEFT JOIN hlidx_areas c ON find_in_set(c.id,a.contrastRegionID) WHERE a.statusID = 'qy' and a.id = #{id}
SELECT a.name FROM hlidx_category a WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT sum(IF(a.huanBi > 0, 1, 0)) AS "rise", sum(IF(a.huanBi = 0, 1, 0)) AS "unbiased", sum(IF(a.huanBi < 0, 1, 0)) AS "descend" FROM page_material_pice a WHERE a.type = '0' AND a.is_del = '0' AND FIND_IN_SET(a.area, '53') AND FIND_IN_SET(a.mid,'8,9,10,11,12,13,16,17,18,19,20,21,22,37,23,24,43,28,29,30,32,33,46,45,42,47') AND month (mdate) = #{timeIntervalMonth} AND year(mdate) = #{timeIntervalYear}
